title: Github Repository Storage
subtitle: A simple GitHub static webpage storage

articles.welcomeText: This is a simple GitHub static webpage storage, demonstrating how to implement basic image and text browsing functionality.
articles.aboutText: This project is created using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, no backend services required, and can be directly deployed to GitHub Pages.
articles.feature1: Responsive design, adapting to different screen sizes

upload.imageSubtitle: Upload images to GitHub repository and get preview links
upload.textSubtitle: Supports emoji, kaomoji, and multiple languages
upload.batchSubtitle: Upload all project files to GitHub repository

login.title: GitHub Account Login
login.subtitle: Log in with your GitHub account for a more convenient experience

callback.message: Processing your login request, please wait...
